title: Tell me about a memorable party or celebration you attended recently.

korean: 어제 친구 생일 파티에 다녀왔는데, 정말 즐거웠어.
친구가 자기 집에서 파티하자고 해서 다 같이 모였어.
각자 음식이랑 술 하나씩 사 가기로 해서, 나는 치킨이랑 맥주를 샀어.
도착하니까 벌써 몇 명이 와 있었고, 음악도 틀어놨더라고.
생일 케이크는 친구 한 명이 준비해 왔는데, 진짜 예쁘게 만들어졌어.
다 같이 생일 축하 노래 부르고 초 끄는 거 보니까 분위기가 좋았어.
케이크 자르면서 주인공 친구가 진짜 행복해 보여서 나도 기분 좋았어.
술 마시면서 게임도 하고 얘기도 하다 보니 시간이 금방 갔어.
한 친구가 노래방 기계를 가져왔는데, 다 같이 노래 부르느라 정신없었어.
밤 12시가 넘어서까지 놀았는데, 진짜 오랜만에 이렇게 웃었어.
집에 갈 때 다들 취해서 택시 잡느라 한참 걸렸어.
집에 와서 누웠는데, 오늘 진짜 재미있었다는 생각이 들었어.
english: Yesterday I went to a friend's, like, birthday party, and it , like, was really fun.
My friend suggested having the party at, like, their place, so we all gathered there.
I mean, we agreed to each bring food and drinks, so I bought chicken and beer.
When I arrived, a few people , like, were already there, and they had music playing.
One friend brought the birthday cake,, like, and it was really beautifully made.
Well, we all sang happy birthday and watched them blow out the candles, the atmosphere was great.
While cutting the cake, the birthday friend looked so happy, and I felt good too.
Drinking and playing games, you know, and talking, time flew by.
One friend brought a karaoke machine, and we were all busy singing together.
We partied past midnight, and I hadn't laughed this much in a long time.
When it was time to go home, everyone was drunk and it took a while to catch taxis.
When I got home and lay down, I thought today , like, was really fun.
